ETYMOLOGY: From French dentiste, from Latin dens, dentis ('tooth').

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: noun: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A person qualified to treat diseases and other conditions that affect the teeth and gums, especially the repair and extraction of teeth and the insertion of artificial ones.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 专门从事牙齿和口腔疾病诊治，包括牙齿修复、拔除以及义齿植入的专业人员。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: I need to make an appointment with the dentist for my annual check-up.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我需要预约牙医进行年度检查。
